categories: Category:Phineas and Ferb: Star Wars voice actors

nodes.text: Jamie Hyneman worked for ILM on the prequel movies The Phantom Menace and Attack of the Clones.
He co-hosted the MythBusters show on the Discovery Channel, along with Adam Savage. In 2014, they hosted a MythBusters Star Wars Special episode.
Hyneman voiced a member of the Galactic Empire along with Savage on Phineas and Ferb: Star Wars.
